channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public footpath pavement highway completely blocked at 06:30 this morning and overnight and EVERY night and Every early Morning. YF72MXY. Pedestrians cannot pass and enforcement is requested from LBB as pedestrians are forced to navigate by entering the dangerous road and traffic., 4th September
item.description:

item.title: Four Lime bikes on motorcycles parking space in Leander Road, 4th September
item.description:
Four Lime bikes have been left lying on the ground in the motorcycle parking space outside 78 Leander Road SW2. There is also a Forest bike outside number 80 but the Lime bikes render the motorcycle parking unusable as seen on photo. The bikes have appeared overnight.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leander Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement ramp needed, 4th September
